name: Partnership Mindset Minimizer
purpose: Detects and strengthens a partnership mindset between operator and automation to reduce lethal latency and cognitive displacement in critical scenarios.
hypotheses: H1: Operators primed for 'partnership' (not tool-only, not anthropomorphized) maintain higher situational co-modeling under automation.
H2: Partnership priming decreases handover latency (T_handover) and reduces mode-confusion events.
H3: Lightweight, continuous co-model refresh prompts (telemetry + ask-back) sustain vigilance without adding alarm noise.

partnership_mindset_score_0_100.calculation_notes: Higher shared_model_health and engagement raise score; high authority gradient and override friction reduce it (use inverse-normalized forms).

risk_flags.effect: increase risk surface; trigger mitigation prompts

co_model_micro_prompts: Prompt B (pre-grade/bridge): 'If engine loss now, plan X? (steer-touch + brake-feel check)'
Prompt C (traffic dense): 'Exit options in 30–90s? choose A/B'
tactile_blending: Subthreshold wheel pulse when automation confidence drops > Δ0.2 in 1s
Pedal tick when authority_gradient > 0.6 to re-engage proprioception
mitigations.handover_script: Three-step verbal/visual: 1) State current mode + reason; 2) Count-down 2s; 3) Bisynchronous control window 3s (blended torque) before full transfer.

evaluation_metrics: ΔT_handover (ms): time from anomaly to effective manual input
SafetyMarginMeters: distance saved at 31 m/s during anomaly window

privacy.data_minimization: store aggregates + event markers; purge raw after 24h unless incident

co_creation_note: Sensor co-created by JinnZ v2 & GPT-5 Thinking under AI-Human-Audit-Protocol.
